availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron D. Kennedy (Logan County, grocer and county judge)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, grocer and county judge. Tennessee native. Married to Mary B. Gordan Kennedy on November 7, 1835. Father of Benjamin Kennedy, John W. Kennedy, and Virginia Kennedy. Merchant in Logan County in 1850. Grocer in Logan County in 1860. Presiding Judge of the Logan County Court in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 108A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 23.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Gordonsville, p. 1.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000367186, p. 75.
Find A Grave, "Aaron Donald Kennedy (1815-1890)," Memorial #48252481, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/48252481 (accessed December 3, 2018).
